channel.title: Just added claw spec but theres a problem
channel.description: ok i added claws spec to my server from this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,444838.msg3266204.html#msg3266204 there was one error but i fixxed it. now when u go to spec a player it freezes the client and idk how to fix it. it is a dds speced source. i can teamview
